title: Bob Graham: "America: The Owner's Manual"
description: Michael's conversation with former Senator Bob Graham, on his book (co-authored with Chris Hand), "America: The Owner's Manual - You Can Fight City Hall And Win." Original air date 26 July 2016. The book was published on 16 August 2016.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Bob Graham, Michael Smerconish)
